div.div: (2) Client module signs operation, then sends to L2 (via aggregation module)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 487px; margin-left: 572px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: BLS signatures of multiple operations are aggregated into one.
Server incentivised to reduce call data, so they can also compress call data parameters

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 296px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 994px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Terminology
Action = smart contract call data.
Operation = Ordered array of actions, performed atomically (all actions succeed, or Operation reverted).
Bundle = Ordered array of Operations.
(Terminology updated to match EIP4337)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 487px; margin-left: 822px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: L2 transaction first expands any compressed call data.
Bundle operations are verified against the aggregated signature in one.
Each operation is then passed to its corresponding wallet to be processed

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 487px; margin-left: 1062px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: Wallet performs operation one action at a time, reverting the operation if any action does not succeed

div.div: (1) dApp action, or additional operation, sends token/eth to tx.origin

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 233px; height: 1px; padding-top: 667px; margin-left: 567px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span:
Server chooses operations to maximise reward.
Eg operations with more rewarding actions

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 667px; margin-left: 352px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (2) Operations can be bundled with a reward operation before sending, guaranteeing a reward even if other operation(s) fail

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 667px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (4) Operations that only have a reward action will always pay tx.origin, operations with actions that fail would not pay tx.origin

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 68px; height: 1px; padding-top: 226px; margin-left: 1163px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (5) Operations that have separate dapp and reward actions will not send the reward if the dapp action fails

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 817px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(204, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 233px; height: 1px; padding-top: 817px; margin-left: 567px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (2) Server incentivised to maintain wallet nonce order to maximise successful operations

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 817px; margin-left: 352px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (1) Operations are signed with next consecutive nonce

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 817px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (3) Operations that don't match the next wallet nonce are skipped

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 817px; margin-left: 1062px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: (4) Operations that are processed increment the wallet nonce whether or it succeeds or not

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 947px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: Ability to configure a hash, for use in resetting the wallet's public key and other delayed actions

switch.text: Ability to configure a hash, for use in resetting...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1027px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: Ability for a wallet to set it's desired verification gateway, and optionally upgrade it's own implementation contract

switch.text: Ability for a wallet to set it's desired verificat...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
